locations: New York City, New York, USA
imdb.plot outline: VidaLexus RPM is an original weekly web series that takes audiences on a musical journey, exploring different Latin music genres and re-engineering their sound with the help of Latin pop sensation Raquel Sofía. The series follows Raquel as she travels to four U.S. cities - Miami, New York, Chicago, and Los Angeles - to learn more about the types of Latin music that have had a strong a cultural presence in each region. Along the way, she enlists the help of expert local musicians to re-imagine each city's genre by combining classical elements with her unique contemporary sound. Throughout her travels, Raquel collaborates with some of the best producers and musicians, including: Mr. Pauer; DJ Le Spam from Spam All Stars; Tony Smurfio from Afrobeta; Ulises Lozano from Kinky; and Marcelo Tijerina from Mexican Dubwiser.
imdb.title: Vidalexus Presents: Reengineering Popular Music with Raquel Sofía
akas: Vidalexus Presents: Reengineering Popular Music with Raquel Sofía (United States)
plot: VidaLexus RPM is an original weekly web series that takes audiences on a musical journey, exploring different Latin music genres and re-engineering their sound with the help of Latin pop sensation Raquel Sofía. The series follows Raquel as she travels to four U.S. cities - Miami, New York, Chicago, and Los Angeles - to learn more about the types of Latin music that have had a strong a cultural presence in each region. Along the way, she enlists the help of expert local musicians to re-imagine each city's genre by combining classical elements with her unique contemporary sound. Throughout her travels, Raquel collaborates with some of the best producers and musicians, including: Mr. Pauer; DJ Le Spam from Spam All Stars; Tony Smurfio from Afrobeta; Ulises Lozano from Kinky; and Marcelo Tijerina from Mexican Dubwiser.
